name: No One Left Alive
description:
HOW TO PLAY

  • A - Move left
  • D - Move right
  • Space - Jump
  • E/K - Swing Sword
  • R - Quick Restart
  • Esc - Pause Menu

---------------------------------------------

No One Left Alive is a basic platforming game where you need to kill all the enemies to open the exit door and finish the level. This game features 5 levels and a boss fight, and was made in the Unity Game Engine. This was a side project of mine where I wanted to focus some of my development skills into a 2D game for a change, and I am pretty happy with how it came out.
